rows.label: qev016101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Now, just a... Hold on! The supplies we brought from
Earth are already starting to run out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0002
rows.name:
These rates of miranium mining aren't enough to
keep New LA going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Yes, I KNOW you're all doing the best you can, but...
Look, it's just not enough! We can't...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh. Hey, rookie. Glad to see you back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0005
rows.name: And, uh, apologies for the scene you walked in on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev016101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Kirsty what's going on.

rows.label: qev016101_JNK0020
rows.name: Mock

rows.label: qev016101_SEL0021
rows.name: Sarcastically tell Kirsty that panicking serves no purpose.

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0006
rows.name:
Well, I suppose this concerns you, too.
May as well brief you on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0007
rows.name:
In the months since crashing here, we've gone through
most of the resources we brought with us on the
White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0008
rows.name:
We're now in the process of transitioning to materials
acquired through FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0009
rows.name:
More than anything, we need a large supply of
miranium to ensure operations here can continue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0010
rows.name: But with so few data probes in place, it's...difficult.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Everyone's so busy that a lot of important work has
gone undone. Maybe you could lend a hand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0012
rows.name: And cocky rookies serve even less of one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0013
rows.name:
But okay, hotshot. If you're such a genius, maybe you
can take care of my little problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0014
rows.name: First I need 750 units of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0015
rows.name:
Then I need someone to deal with a pack of juvenile
simius that keep hassling Pathfinders out in Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0016
rows.name:
And finally, I have my own little spec op—I need a
storage device known as data unit FN093 to be
recovered. It contains some top-secret info.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0017
rows.name:
If my calculations are correct, it should have also fallen
to the planet's surface somewhere out in Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0018
rows.name:
If you take care of all that, I'll make sure it's worth
your while. Deal?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0019
rows.name:
All right, then. To mine more miranium, you'll need to
install new data probes. You know the deal, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'd recommend expanding Primordia's FrontierNav as
you tackle other missions in the area—such efficiency
is the Pathfinder way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0021
rows.name: Try to keep that in mind as you work, rookie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_JNK0030
rows.name: Show Gratitude

rows.label: qev016101_SEL0031
rows.name: Thank Kirsty for the advice.

rows.label: qev016101_JNK0040
rows.name: Scoff

rows.label: qev016101_SEL0041
rows.name: Demand Kirsty stop calling you "rookie."

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0022
rows.name:
No worries. But it's still nice to get a thanks once in a
while, so keep it up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Finish this mission, and you'll be a full-fledged BLADE
as far as I'm concerned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0024
rows.name: All right. Good luck out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Oh, I'm sorry. Did you just get promoted?
I must have blinked and missed it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Finish this mission, and then we'll talk about
your standing with BLADE, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0027
rows.name: Good luck out there. ...Rookie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0028
rows.name:
The people of New LA are counting on FrontierNav,
which means they're counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0029
rows.name:
I know that gathering 750 units of miranium isn't
your everyday stroll in the park.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0030
rows.name:
But if you make good use of FrontierNav,
I'm certain you'll get there soon enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0031
rows.name:
We all have to work hard to make New LA into what
it should be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0032
rows.name:
How goes the miranium gathering? I think 750 units
should be enough to see us through for the time being.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0033
rows.name:
Thanks a bunch. I'll see that it gets distributed among
the city's industries.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0034
rows.name:
I hope you'll tackle the rest of my Primordia
assignments with the same vigor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0035
rows.name: You've given us enough miranium for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0036
rows.name:
Now I hope you'll carry out the remaining assignments
in Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0037
rows.name:
Good. Thanks to everyone's efforts, FrontierNav
continues to grow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0038
rows.name:
How are things on your end?
Those missions I gave you coming along?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_JNK0050
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev016101_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that they're all finished, then flex a little.

rows.label: qev016101_JNK0060
rows.name: Report

rows.label: qev016101_SEL0061
rows.name: Politely inform your superior that all tasks are complete.

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0039
rows.name:
Hmm... Well, you've given us enough miranium,
and you've completed the other tasks perfectly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0040
rows.name:
Looks like you're right to be proud.
...Even if it is a bit unbecoming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0041
rows.name:
Hmm... Well, you've given us enough miranium,
and you've completed the other tasks perfectly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0042
rows.name:
You say it like it's just another day's work,
but those weren't easy assignments for a new BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0043
rows.name:
You've been a big help. Now I think the effort to
build New LA can finally get back on track.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0044
rows.name:
You've proven yourself. From this point on,
I'll be treating you as a full-fledged BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0045
rows.name:
Oh, and here's your payment. I look forward to
working with you again, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_JNK0070
rows.name: Deliver[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_SEL0071
rows.name: Hand over 750 units of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_JNK0080
rows.name: Keep[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_SEL0081
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev016101_MSG0046
rows.name:
This city chews through more miranium every second.
We don't have any time to waste. So hurry up with
that delivery, rookie.[ST:wait ]
